title: HELP WITH SKINS
body: Hey guys I was wondering when the SKT T1 skins are available again to buy what are the exact dates and same for championship skins when are they out as well please give exact dates

replies.body: But are those skins going. To be available for purchase again ever or not

We don't have exact dates for when they'll be up for sale, and it doesn't look like they'll be [**on sale throughout**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule-1). Keep in mind that Legacy skins above 520 RP are available through Hextech Crafting, and the VS Orbs give a guaranteed Legacy skin shard! That'd be a good way to try and get them while the event is going.
